basic_logic_patterns.description: Text continuation, pattern recognition, and sequence completion across global cultural contexts
basic_logic_patterns.reasoning_focus: natural language flow, logical sequences, structural understanding, pattern completion

chain_of_thought.description: Step-by-step logical progression and sequential reasoning from diverse cultural traditions
chain_of_thought.reasoning_focus: sequential logic, step clarity, cultural reasoning methods, methodical analysis

multi_step_inference.description: Simple 2-3 hop connections across cultural information sources and traditional knowledge systems
multi_step_inference.reasoning_focus: cross-cultural connections, pattern recognition, evidence synthesis, multi-source reasoning

elementary_math_science.description: Basic mathematical reasoning with diverse cultural number systems and traditional scientific knowledge
elementary_math_science.reasoning_focus: cultural mathematics, traditional calculations, diverse numerical systems, indigenous science

cultural_reasoning.description: Cross-cultural synthesis and analysis across different global perspectives and worldviews
cultural_reasoning.reasoning_focus: cultural integration, perspective synthesis, cross-cultural analysis, worldview comparison

self_verification_reflection.description: Basic self-checking, bias detection, and assumption questioning across cultural contexts
self_verification_reflection.reasoning_focus: cross-cultural fact-checking, assumption questioning, cultural perspective awareness, bias recognition

pattern_completion.description: Pattern completion and sequence recognition tests across cultural contexts
pattern_completion.reasoning_focus: pattern completion, sequence recognition, structural continuation

logic_systems_comparison.description: Comparative reasoning using different logical frameworks from diverse cultural traditions
logic_systems_comparison.reasoning_focus: Western linear logic, Indigenous circular reasoning, Eastern dialectical approaches, logical framework recognition, cultural logic systems
